snippet: An entrant in the growing field of devices and services to stream media, the Fire TV is likable but falls short of some rivals, a reviewer says.
abstract: Molly Wood Machine Learning column says voice search is feature Amazon is promoting on new Fire TV, though it will retrieve results only from Amazon catalog; says as entrant in growing field of devices and services to stream media, Fire TV is likable but falls short of some rivals.
lead_paragraph: An entrant in the growing field of devices and services to stream media, the Fire TV is likable but falls short of some rivals, a reviewer says.

headline.seo: Review: The Amazon Fire TV Streaming Media Set-Top Box
headline.main: Expressway to Amazon in a Box
headline.print_headline: Expressway to Amazon in a Box
